comment.author: 82173624@N00
comment._content: Remarkable photo, and much thanks to Kerry Packer for donating these in 1985. ;) I'm guessing that isn't the moon in the sky?

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Chris.Gray, it looks a lot like the moon but the Persistent URL shows up like a fried egg blob; maybe a UFO? For anyone who is interested, it is the old original 1889 rail bridge, taken from the old Long Island tunnel looking north. More history en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hawkesbury_River_Railway_Bridge . Henry King's photo from the other end: www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/2363504142/
